title: Why AI Agents Are Replacing SaaS
markdownContent:
# Why AI Agents Are Replacing SaaS

The software industry is undergoing a fundamental shift.

- AI agents are moving from experimentation to production.
- This will redefine how products are built and sold.

> The next wave of software will be agent-native.

content.text: The software industry is undergoing a fundamental shift.
AI agents are moving from experimentation to production.
This will redefine how products are built and sold.
